title: Dark Pleasures
description: It’s not supposed to happen to people like me. Broken, damaged people don't get to fall in love with amazing, handsome men like Rylan Archer. And men like Rylan never look twice at women like me. Except he had. Rylan loves me. I love him, too... and it scares me to death.After the incident with former co-worker Christophe Constantine, twenty-two year-old Jenna Lang knows she can’t run from her past anymore. Forced to confront the demons from her childhood, she's faced with the choice between justice for herself, or saving others like her.Don't miss book 2 in the dark and sizzling Pleasures series by USA Today best-selling author M.S. Parker.
author: M.S. Parker
